description: This course facilitates oral and written use of the language through conversation and composition, English to Russian translation, selections from Russian literature, and original themes. Prerequisite: Russian 232 or special permission of the instructor.
name: Conversation & Comp
prerequisites: Russian 232 or special permission of the instructor.

revisions.prerequisites: Prerequisite: Russian 232 or special permission of the instructor.

title: Conversation and Composition
